members.name: Dr. Amit Yaniv Rosenfeld
members.title: Post-doc
members.description: Amit is a post-doc in Haifa University, Information System department. Amit's research will focus on developing novel machine learning methods for psychiatric patient management.

members.name: Dr. Meirav Har Even
members.title: Post-doc
members.description: Meirav is a post-doc in Haifa University, Information System department, registered dietitian and neuroscience researcher. Meirav's research will focus on a cool thing we still looking for at this moment.

members.name: Dr. Maxim Glebov
members.title: PhD. Student
members.description: Maxim is a PhD student in Haifa University, Information System department. Maxim's research focuses on machine learning for perioperative workflow optimization and enhanced surgical outcomes

members.name: Irena Shami
members.title: PhD. Student
members.description: Irena is a PhD student in Haifa University, Information System department. Irena's research focuses on leveraging LLMs, ML, and Socio-Economic profiling for fair, transparent portfolio optimisation

members.name: Adi Shuchami
members.title: PhD. Student
members.description: Adi is a PhD student in Ariel University, department of Mathematics, under the joint supervision of Prof. Svetlana Bunimovich-Mendrazitsky and mine. Adi's research focuses on the data science of dual-use community and hospital data in data-driven decision-support using machine and deep learning models.

members.name: Ariel Alexi
members.title: PhD. Student
members.description: Ariel is a PhD Student in Bar Ilan University, department of Information Science, under the joint supervision of Prof. Ariel Rosenfeld and mine. Ariel's investigates scientometric dynamics using bio-mathematical modeling approach. Ariel did her Master degree at Bar Ilan University, department of Information Science, under the joint supervision of Prof. Ariel Rosenfeld and mine.

members.name: Amit Bengiat
members.title: PhD. Student
members.description: Amit is a PhD Student in Bar Ilan University, department of Information Science, under the joint supervision of Prof. Ariel Rosenfeld and mine. Amit's research focused on the scientometric properties and dynamics of academic collaborations.

members.name: Dr. Assaf Shmuel
members.title: PhD. Student
members.description: Assaf is a PhD Student in Bar Ilan University, department of Computer Science, under the joint supervision of Dr. Oren Glickman and mine. Assaf's research focuses on integrating symbolic regression into machine and deep learning models to obtain accurate and explainable data-driven models. An additional part of his research focuses on generalization and out-of-distribution prediction in machine and deep learning.

members.name: Lukas Toral
members.title: McS. Student
members.description: Lukas is a Master student in Jonkoping University, department of Computing. Lukas's research focuses on using pre-trained large language models with reinforcement learning in a teacher-student architecture to accelerate reinforcement learning models' convergence.

members.name: Bilge Taskin
members.title: McS. Student
members.description: Bilge was a Master student in Jonkoping University, department of Computing. Bilge's research focused on introducing domain knowledge using pre-trained large language models to physical symbolic regression models.

members.name: Wenxiong Xie
members.title: McS. Student
members.description: Wenxiong was a Master student in Jonkoping University, department of Computing. Wenxiong's research focused on introducing domain knowledge using pre-trained large language models to physical symbolic regression models.

members.name: Eden Aloni
members.title: BS. Student
members.description: Eden was a bachelor student in Ariel University, department of Mathematics. Eden's research focused on mathematically modeling the connections between stress and cancer development.

members.name: Naor Matania
members.title: Research assistance
members.description: Naor lead the research and development of a machine learning model of clinical data obtained from Clalit for lung cancer prediction from sparse blood samples.

members.name: Liron Simon-Keren
members.title: MS. Student
members.description: Liron, an honored M.Sc. graduate in Mechanical Engineering from Tel Aviv University, conducted research on symbolic regression frameworks with knowledge integration. She applied them to generate predictive correlations in fluid dynamics under the joint supervision of Prof. Alex Liberzon and myself.

members.name: Tzach Fleischer
members.title: Research assistance
members.description: Tzach participented in a study entitled 'Benchmarking biologically-inspired automatic machine learning for economic tasks'. He was responsible for the data curation, study design, and running the experiments.

members.name: Yonatan Herskowitz
members.title: MS. Student
members.description: Yonatan was a MS Student in Ariel University, department of Mathematics, under the joint supervision of Prof. Svetlana Bunimovich-Mendrazitsky and mine. Yonatan's research focused on pandemic spread modeling for coffee tree and its control using biological agents.

members.name: Liel Mushiev
members.title: Research assistance
members.description: Liel participented in a study that proposed a novel scientometrics metric using big data analysis of researcher with a focus on the mathematical domain.
